item.title: Altair to the Rescue
item.description:
Bad charts made better: A beginner-friendly altair tutorial

Some charts are confusing, some hard to interpret, and others are just boring, while still others (albeit a special, minority few) require that the rules of math and logic break in order to establish a reality in which they make sense—though â€¦
item.dc:creator: Megan Karabin
